data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Anantnag access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Anantnag, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Anantnag, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Anantnag, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 11,866 believers in the county of Anantnag to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Lama people. Make the Lama people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, sanctify the 11,866 believers in Anantnag and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Anantnag to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Anantnag, Jammu and Kashmir, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Anantnag
location.people_groups_list: Sapiada, Saryara (Muslim traditions), Shakhsaz, Gaddi (Muslim traditions), Kavoj
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Sapiada (100), Saryara (Muslim traditions) (2,000), Shakhsaz (2,700), Gaddi (Muslim traditions) (431,000), Kavoj (400)
